name: MiniBTC
description: "$MINIBTC is a deflationary token designed to become more scarce over time. All holders of MINIBTC will earn more MINIBTC that is automatically sent to your wallet by simply holding MINIBTC coins in your wallet. Watch the amount of MINIBTC grow in your wallet as MINIBTC coin holders automatically receive a 5% fee from every transaction that happens on the MINIBTC network. The community receives more MINIBTC coins from the fees generated each transaction."
